metadata.title: CVE-2024-24265 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: gpac v2.2.1 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the dst_propsvariable in the gf_filter_pid_merge_properties_internal function.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
